Package com.simplechat.client

Class Summary
Client SimpleChat client main class.
ClientKeepAliveRecieveThread Thread sleeps for 60 seconds then disconnects the client, unless interrupted.
ClientKeepAliveThread Sends keep alive packets to the server.
ClientShutdownThread Called on client shutdown.
ConnectTimeoutThread Thread for server connection timeout, exits client after 10 seconds unless interrupted.
ConsoleInputThread This thread handles client console input for chatting.
NameData Container for data about the client.
PacketHandlerThread Handler for received packets, threaded for efficiency.
PacketRecieverThread Thread for receiving packets, passes them to a new PacketHandlerThread.
ServerData Container for data about the server.
